description: This innovative housing model accommodates a family of 16, showcasing adaptive design that harmonizes with its environment. The structure features pioneering use of bamboo and palm materials, incorporates buoyant platforms, and thoughtfully connects interior spaces to the waterline, blending sustainability with aesthetics.

events.name: Drop in
events.notes:
Please let us know if you plan to visit. Doing so allows
                    the venue to plan ahead and you will be notified by email
                    about any changes to the programme that might affect your
                    visit.

factsheet.heading: An Adaptive and Aesthetic
paragraphs: Our venue is easily accessible by public transport. Several bus routes stop close by, and secure bicycle parking is available on site for those who wish to cycle.

Conceptual rendering of the floating house design.

name: Sustainable Design in Action: An Adaptive and Aesthetic
